ISSUE.TITLE: remote.uncache minAge parameter is not working as execpted
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** remote.uncache minAge parameter is not working as describe in document (wiki & help) help says: `remote.uncache -minAge=3600 # uncache files older than 1 hour` but when running: `remote.uncache -minAge=1296000` most recent files are uncached as well. I check the remote.uncache command source code: ``` ... ff.minAge = remoteMountCommand.Int64("minAge", -1, "minimum file age in seconds") ... if *ff.minAge != -1 { if entry.Attributes.Crtime < *ff.minAge { return false } } ``` and fs.meta.cat shows Crtime is epoch time, compare Crtime with minAge parameter seems unreasonable. **Expected behavior** minAge parameter should work as describe. (and maxAge as well)
